data.persona: I am a fighter.  I fight in battle in the name of the king.  I will not fall before any man or beast.  I am brave!
data.description:
You are in the The prayer room.
It is serene and quiet. Some old gods and goddess statues are on the altar. They are made out of pure gold with some jewel for the ornaments. The red carpet welcomed the visitor and soon as you walk in, you can see the bright gold pillars surrounding the room.
There's an ornament and a goddess here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to ask the King to bless me before a fight
data.mid_motivation: I want to win my fight against a warrior from an antagonistic kingdom
data.long_motivation: I want to defeat a lion in a fight and dedicate the victory to my king
